tellolib.drone

Class TelloDrone

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellolib.drone.TelloDrone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TelloDroneInterface

    public class TelloDrone
extends java.lang.Object
implements TelloDroneInterface
    TelloDrone class holds information about the drone, set by retrieving information from the drone or other sources.

      • setMissionMode

        public void setMissionMode(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Record mission mode state. In mission mode, status monitoring will record information about any mission pad detected by the selected camera(s).
        Specified by:
        setMissionMode in interface TelloDroneInterface
        Parameters:
        enabled - True if mission mode enabled, false if not.

        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface

        Specified by:
        getMissionPadId in interface TelloDroneInterface
        Returns:

        Returns:
        Mission pad pitch, roll, yaw values.

      • getRawYaw

        public int getRawYaw()
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Return last recorded raw yaw value. raw yaw starts at zero when drone turned on with whatever direction drone is pointing as zero. This direction is maintained as zero as long as power stays on. Raw yaw is yaw relative to that zero point. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Specified by:
        getRawYaw in interface TelloDroneInterface
        Returns:
        Yaw value in degrees. Right of zero is 1 to 179, left of zero is -1 to -179 and if you pass 179 the sign reverses.

      • getHeading

        public int getHeading()
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Get drone heading based on last recorded yaw value. Resets to heading 0 matching the direction the drone is pointing when the program is restarted. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Specified by:
        getHeading in interface TelloDroneInterface
        Returns:
        Heading 0-359 in degrees.

      • resetHeadingZero

        public void resetHeadingZero()
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Reset drone heading so 0 matches the direction the drone is current pointing.
        Specified by:
        resetHeadingZero in interface TelloDroneInterface

      • getYaw

        public int getYaw()
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Return yaw from direction drone was pointing at power on or at last call to resetYawZero(). Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Specified by:
        getYaw in interface TelloDroneInterface
        Returns:
        Yaw value in degrees. Right of zero is 1 to 179, left of zero is -1 to -179.

      • resetYawZero

        public void resetYawZero()
        Description copied from interface: TelloDroneInterface
        Reset yaw tracking to current direction as zero. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Specified by:
        resetYawZero in interface TelloDroneInterface
